Message: My mind sank into the dark abyss.

Many have perished
to keep me alive.

’Tis my duty to bear
the weight of those lives,
and live on in solitude.

Hence, I convinced myself
that I was special.

To flee from the responsibility
of bearing such a heavy burden.

Yet...the moment I met Asahi,
I felt my heart tremble.

Much like everyone else,
I long for someone I can live with.

I wish they see me not as special,
but simply as me.
Someone who calls my name, and...!
“Lady Kaguya!!”

In that moment,
a voice reached mine ears.
A voice that calls
not for the Princess,
but for me.
This voice is...

“I shall live by your side
simply as Asahi!

So, please come back to me...
LADY KAGUYA!”

Golden hues of light
melt away the darkness,
guiding me back to reality.

There is but one I know
who can perform such a feat.

The one whose
unceasing noise has
brightened my world
ever so vibrantly.
My sunshine.
Yet...

“As the one who
willed mine own
country’s destruction,
I can no longer
call myself a princess...
However...”

Asahi then smiled
as she had done
when we first met,
dispelling my
lingering anxieties,
and spoke.

“Yes. From now, till forever.
I shall dedicate my life
to you...Lady Kaguya.”

If I have compelled thee
to speak so, then I must
assume responsibility.
From now, till forever,
I, too, shall be at thy side.

Not as a princess,
but simply as Kaguya.
